advisor.welcome: How can I advise you today?
advisor.description: I help clarify strategy, diagnose issues, and prepare execution plans. Choose an intent to get started.

objective.title: Define a business objective
objective.desc: Clarify what you want to achieve and why.

diagnose.title: Diagnose a problem
diagnose.desc: Identify root causes of business or marketing issues.

strategy.title: Plan a strategy
strategy.desc: Map out a roadmap for growth or launch.

tools.title: Evaluate tools & workflows
tools.desc: Find the right tech stack for your needs.

brief.title: Prepare execution brief
brief.desc: Create a clear spec for the technical team.

idle.title: No runs yet
idle.desc: Start a workflow to see execution details, logs, and potential errors here.
idle.hint: Hint: Runs and errors will appear here.

agent.description: What are we automating today? Markaitek handles the governance.
agent.placeholder: e.g., Whenever a high-priority ticket arrives in Jira, summarize it with GPT-4 and slack the Engineering Ops channel...
agent.uploadHint: Drag spec or click to upload

editor.noSelectionDesc: Select a node from the canvas to access configuration properties.

insights.description: Auto-fit automation based on your historical success patterns.
insights.intentPlaceholder: e.g. Sync Salesforce Closed-Won deals to NetSuite as invoices
insights.recommendation: Based on your last 50 workflows, we recommend using the Finance-v2 connector pack.

auth.signInDesc: Sign in to your account to continue
auth.newToMarkaitek: New to Markaitek? Create an account
auth.joinTeams: Join thousands of teams building with AI
auth.passwordHint: Use 8 or more characters with a mix of letters, numbers & symbols
auth.agreeTerms: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
auth.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Log in

validation.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.agreeRequired: You must agree to the terms
validation.emailInvalidForgot: Please enter a valid email address

auth.forgotPasswordSubtitle: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions
auth.resetSentDesc: We've sent a password reset link to
auth.didntReceiveEmail: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or
auth.verifyEmailDesc: We've sent a verification code to
auth.enterCode: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your inbox
